pr_title: WFLY-11808 Unable to do jndi lookup when starting batch job from web …

timeline.bodyText: I think we should probably just pass the NamespaceContextSelector rather than the EEModuleDescription. It seems like we shouldn't be holding a reference to that in a service.
timeline.author: jamezp

replies.bodyText: Changed to pass NamespaceContextSelector instead of EEModuleDescription.
replies.author: chengfang
